page.title: 19CUSTOM
page.content: WAR MEMORIAL THE WAR MEMORIAL IN BRIDGEFOOT WAS ERECTED TO COMMEMORATE THE MEN WHO DIED IN THE FIRST WORLD WAR. THE INSCRIPTION SAYS, IN LOVING AND GRATEFUL MEMORY OF THE MEN FROM SRATHMARTINE WHO FELL IN THE GREAT WAR 1914-18. LATER ANOTHER INSCRIPTION WAS MADE TO COMMEMORATE THE MEN WHO DIED IN THE SECOND WORLD WAR 1939-45. EVERY REMEMBRANCE SUNDAY CHILDREN FROM THE VARIOUS GROUPS E.G. GUIDES, BOYS' BRIGADE OF STRATHMARTINE PARISH CHURCH AND MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY COUNCIL AND PEOPLE CONNECTED WITH BRIDGEFOOT LAY WREATHS TO REMEMBER THE MEN OF THEIR VILLAGE.
